publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4402 Ross Finnie: Praising Knoxland Primary School—That the Parliament praises Knoxland Primary School in West Dunbartonshire for the first-rate HM Inspectorate of Education report that it received, containing three good ratings and two very good ratings and also praising the children’s behaviour and motivation to learn and the leadership of the head teacher.
S3M-4402 Praising Knoxland Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jackie Baillie*, Stuart McMillan*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-4402 Praising Knoxland Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2009) Aileen Campbell*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-4402 Ross Finnie: Praising Knoxland Primary School—That the Parliament praises Knoxland Primary School in West Dunbartonshire for the first-rate HM Inspectorate of Education report that it received, containing three good ratings and two very good ratings and also praising the children’s behaviour and motivation to learn and the leadership of the head teacher. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jamie McGrigor, Jackie Baillie, Stuart McMillan, Mike Pringle, Aileen Campbell, Gil Paterson
S3M-4402 Praising Knoxland Primary School (lodged on 16 June 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
